Returns list of model. Private, unpublished,
  models cannot be retreived with this method.This endpoint is **paginated** by 24 models per pages.

parameters.description: a `username`. Retreives the models uploaded by `user`

parameters.description: a tag slug. Retreives the models tagged with the query filter tags. If used multiple time, return models tagged with all the specified tags.
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: array of categories slug. Retreives the models in the specified categories
parameters.name: categories

parameters.description: a username retreives the models liked by user

parameters.description: Retreives the models with an animation_count greater than 0.
parameters.name: animated
